reviewText: This is NOT yoga; it is only meditation / energy healing. See my other Amazon review on another Sura Flow DVD that said that it was self-discovery "yoga," but was only meditation: https://www.amazon.com/review/R32MDQBP5YD8PZ/ref=cm_cr_rdp_perm?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B006SKP9B6 This contents of this energy healing DVD (PLUS the above one that I reviewed!) are both INCLUDED in Sura's 3rd and cheaper DVD (the only one in stock at the time of this writing anyway): Sura Flow Yoga: Complete Beginners Program ''Energy Healing, Yoga & Meditation''. THAT "Beginners' Program" actually features yoga. While soothing for what it is, this DVD is not yoga.
Sura's unique perspective on energy healing is really invigorating.  I've taken class with her in person and watched this DVD and can highly recommend both!
